subtopics: 1.1.1 External parts of the human body
learning_outcomes: 1.1.1.1 Identify the external parts of the human body.
1.1.2.1 Identify the parts associated with the senses
1.1.3.1 Identify the stages in the human life cycle.
1.1.3.2 Describe what a human being can do at different stages of growth.
1.1.3.3 Mention what the clinic does for babies and children in the community
1.2.1.1 Explain the importance of keeping the body clean.
1.2.1.2 Demonstrate how to clean the face, teeth, hands and feet.
1.2.1.3 Explain the importance of washing hands.
1.2.1.4 Explain the importance of keeping the surroundings clean.
1.2.2.1 State common communicable diseases
1.3.1.1 Identify the main features of the local environment.
1.3.1.2 Distinguish between urban and rural environment.
1.3.1.3 Explain the importance of the environment to living things.
1.4.1.1 Identify plants in the local environment.
1.4.1.2 Observe the early stages of plant growth.
1.4.2.1 Identify wild and domestic animals in the local
1.4.2.2 Name things that all animals do.
1.5.1.1 Identify different types of materials.
1.5.1.2 Describe properties of materials.
1.5.1.3 Explain different uses of materials.
